scripts.vercel-build: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; FLUTTER_VERSION=3.38.3; rm -rf $HOME/flutter; curl -sSLo /tmp/flutter-sdk.tar.xz https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_${FLUTTER_VERSION}-stable.tar.xz; tar -xf /tmp/flutter-sdk.tar.xz -C $HOME; git config --global --add safe.directory $HOME/flutter; export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"; printf "GOOGLE_PLACES_API_KEY=%s\n" "$GOOGLE_PLACES_API_KEY" > .env; flutter config --enable-web; flutter pub get; flutter build web --release'
